hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #cow swallowed by Jabu Jabu# gifts #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Mirror Shield#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Near Boss Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #a Hylian Shield#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Prelude of Light# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that shadows in an #invisible maze# guard #a Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Bomb Flower Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #2# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: These hints can be quite useful. This is an exception.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Deku Scrub Center

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the path to Termina is a one-way trip.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple MQ Falling Ceiling Room Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: You're comparing yourself to me?^Ha! You're not even good enough to be my fake.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #Bombchus (10 pieces)# and #a Small Key#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Basement Near Vines Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Deku Scrub Left

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Forest Temple#.
